abilities.name: stench
abilities.description: By releasing a stench when attacking, the Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

abilities.name: drizzle
abilities.description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

abilities.name: speed-boost
abilities.description: The Pokémon's Speed stat is boosted every turn.

abilities.name: battle-armor
abilities.description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.

abilities.name: limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon's limber body prevents it from being paralyzed.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: static
abilities.description: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: volt-absorb
abilities.description: If hit by an Electric-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.description: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: oblivious
abilities.description: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

abilities.name: cloud-nine
abilities.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

abilities.name: compound-eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

abilities.name: insomnia
abilities.description: The Pokémon's insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

abilities.name: color-change
abilities.description: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

abilities.name: immunity
abilities.description: The Pokémon's immune system prevents it from being poisoned.

abilities.name: flash-fire
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: shield-dust
abilities.description: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.

abilities.name: own-tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.

abilities.name: suction-cups
abilities.description: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.description: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

abilities.name: shadow-tag
abilities.description: The Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadows to prevent them from fleeing or switching out.

abilities.name: rough-skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon's rough skin damages attackers that make direct contact with it.

abilities.name: wonder-guard
abilities.description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

abilities.name: levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.

abilities.name: synchronize
abilities.description: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.

abilities.name: clear-body
abilities.description: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.

abilities.name: natural-cure
abilities.description: The Pokémon's status conditions are cured when it switches out.

abilities.name: lightning-rod
abilities.description: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves.

abilities.name: swift-swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.

abilities.name: chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: illuminate
abilities.description: By illuminating its surroundings, the Pokémon prevents its accuracy from being lowered.

abilities.name: trace
abilities.description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.

abilities.name: huge-power
abilities.description: Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.

abilities.name: poison-point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: inner-focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.

abilities.name: magma-armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon's hot magma coating prevents it from being frozen.

abilities.name: water-veil
abilities.description: The Pokémon's water veil prevents it from being burned.

abilities.name: magnet-pull
abilities.description: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.

abilities.name: soundproof
abilities.description: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.

abilities.name: rain-dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

abilities.name: sand-stream
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

abilities.name: pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

abilities.name: early-bird
abilities.description: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.

abilities.name: flame-body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: keen-eye
abilities.description: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.

abilities.name: hyper-cutter
abilities.description: The Pokémon's proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

abilities.name: truant
abilities.description: Each time the Pokémon uses a move, it spends the next turn loafing around.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but lowers its accuracy.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.description: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.

abilities.name: plus
abilities.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

abilities.name: minus
abilities.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

abilities.name: forecast
abilities.description: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

abilities.name: stick-hold
abilities.description: The Pokémon's held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: shed-skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

abilities.name: guts
abilities.description: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

abilities.name: marvel-scale
abilities.description: The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost its Defense stat if it has a status condition.

abilities.name: liquid-ooze
abilities.description: The strong stench of the Pokémon's oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves.

abilities.name: overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: rock-head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: drought
abilities.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: arena-trap
abilities.description: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing from battle.

abilities.name: vital-spirit
abilities.description: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

abilities.name: white-smoke
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: pure-power
abilities.description: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

abilities.name: shell-armor
abilities.description: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

abilities.name: air-lock
abilities.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

abilities.name: tangled-feet
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness if it is confused.

abilities.name: motor-drive
abilities.description: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: rivalry
abilities.description: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

abilities.name: steadfast
abilities.description: The Pokémon's determination boosts its Speed stat every time it flinches.

abilities.name: snow-cloak
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in snow.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.description: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

abilities.name: anger-point
abilities.description: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

abilities.name: unburden
abilities.description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.

abilities.name: heatproof
abilities.description: The Pokémon's heatproof body halves the damage taken from Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: simple
abilities.description: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon's stat changes.

abilities.name: dry-skin
abilities.description: Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in sunshine, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: download
abilities.description: Compares an opposing Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

abilities.name: iron-fist
abilities.description: Powers up punching moves.

abilities.name: poison-heal
abilities.description: If poisoned, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

abilities.name: skill-link
abilities.description: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.

abilities.name: hydration
abilities.description: Cures the Pokémon's status conditions in rain.

abilities.name: solar-power
abilities.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases every turn.

abilities.name: quick-feet
abilities.description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

abilities.name: normalize
abilities.description: All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

abilities.name: sniper
abilities.description: If the Pokémon's attack lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up even further.

abilities.name: magic-guard
abilities.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

abilities.name: no-guard
abilities.description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

abilities.name: stall
abilities.description: The Pokémon is always the last to use its moves.

abilities.name: technician
abilities.description: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.

abilities.name: leaf-guard
abilities.description: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: klutz
abilities.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: mold-breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

abilities.name: super-luck
abilities.description: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

abilities.name: aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.

abilities.name: anticipation
abilities.description: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.

abilities.name: forewarn
abilities.description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

abilities.name: unaware
abilities.description: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target's stat changes.

abilities.name: tinted-lens
abilities.description: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.

abilities.name: filter
abilities.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

abilities.name: slow-start
abilities.description: For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.

abilities.name: scrappy
abilities.description: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

abilities.name: storm-drain
abilities.description: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in snow.

abilities.name: solid-rock
abilities.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

abilities.name: snow-warning
abilities.description: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

abilities.name: honey-gather
abilities.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

abilities.name: frisk
abilities.description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.

abilities.name: reckless
abilities.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

abilities.name: multitype
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the plate it holds.

abilities.name: flower-gift
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies when it is sunny.

abilities.name: bad-dreams
abilities.description: Damages opposing Pokémon that are asleep.

abilities.name: pickpocket
abilities.description: The Pokémon steals the held item from attackers that make direct contact with it.

abilities.name: sheer-force
abilities.description: Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.

abilities.name: contrary
abilities.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

abilities.name: unnerve
abilities.description: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: defiant
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

abilities.name: defeatist
abilities.description: Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.description: May disable a move that has dealt damage to the Pokémon.

abilities.name: healer
abilities.description: Sometimes cures the status conditions of the Pokémon's allies.

abilities.name: friend-guard
abilities.description: Reduces damage dealt to allies.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.

abilities.name: heavy-metal
abilities.description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

abilities.name: light-metal
abilities.description: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

abilities.name: multiscale
abilities.description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

abilities.name: toxic-boost
abilities.description: Powers up physical moves when the Pokémon is poisoned.

abilities.name: flare-boost
abilities.description: Powers up special moves when the Pokémon is burned.

abilities.name: harvest
abilities.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

abilities.name: telepathy
abilities.description: The Pokémon anticipates and dodges the attacks of its allies.

abilities.name: moody
abilities.description: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

abilities.name: overcoat
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.

abilities.name: poison-touch
abilities.description: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

abilities.name: regenerator
abilities.description: The Pokémon has a little of its HP restored when withdrawn from battle.

abilities.name: big-pecks
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from having its Defense stat lowered.

abilities.name: sand-rush
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: wonder-skin
abilities.description: Makes status moves more likely to miss the Pokémon.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.description: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's move if it is the last to act that turn.

abilities.name: illusion
abilities.description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party's last spot.

abilities.name: imposter
abilities.description: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.

abilities.name: infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.

abilities.name: mummy
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.

abilities.name: moxie
abilities.description: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.

abilities.name: justified
abilities.description: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.

abilities.name: rattled
abilities.description: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.

abilities.name: magic-bounce
abilities.description: The Pokémon reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.

abilities.name: sap-sipper
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move, instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.description: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: iron-barbs
abilities.description: The Pokémon's iron barbs damage the attacker if it makes direct contact.

abilities.name: zen-mode
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon's shape when its HP drops to half or less.

abilities.name: victory-star
abilities.description: Boosts the accuracy of the Pokémon and its allies.

abilities.name: turboblaze
abilities.description: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

abilities.name: teravolt
abilities.description: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.
